subject: Re: Thank you for your recent loan request, we are ready to lend money regardless of Credit
body:
Your credit doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pocket money to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your entire payment by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this tender will expire TODAY):
$344,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest payments!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill this simple form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!
http://icvbmitecat.com/
